name: Prime Horror
description:
Prime Horror is a horror like none other. Which is game dev talk for its the exact same thing as the last 5000 games. An 8 pages horror game. Like we're lacking any of those. BUT in the theme of a warehouse where you must collect 8 packages for Jeff Bezos before he kills you. 

The download is Zipped to avoid forcing the user to download ever file needed. So once downloaded Please right click and extract to where you keep your games please I'm new to this.
